entry.title: $2595 // Beautiful 2bed right by Prospect Park! PRIME Lefferts Gardens! LAUNDRY
entry.content:
Beautiful 2 Bedroom apartment right by Prospect Park! Elevator + Laundry!
Steps to the B & Q trains!

Apartment Features:
- Excellent Modern Kitchen with Granite Countertops and lots of cabinet space!
- Spacious bedrooms!
- High Ceilings!
- Lots of Natural Light!
- BIKE STORAGE!
- Elevator building!
- Laundry Room on-site!
- Heat and hot water included!

Amazing location right by Prospect Park - enjoy the lake, skating rink, bike paths, and more!
Steps to the B & Q trains and the Franklin Ave Shuttle.
Minutes to Planet Fitness, Wholesome Gourmet Market, and all the excellent Restaurants & Shops on Flatbush Ave!

**Call, Text, or Email Chevy to view: 347-786-4837 / chevy@zjamarealty.com **
